job_tasks.phrase: Craft elegant, modern web applications using cutting-edge technologies and frameworks
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the creation of software applications, a core aspect of Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Pioneer new frontiers in cloud computing with advanced AWS serverless architectures
job_tasks.justification: Working with cloud computing and serverless architectures falls under the umbrella of operations and infrastructure management for deploying and running applications, aligning with MLOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Shape our engineering culture through thoughtful code reviews and best practice implementation
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews and implementing best practices inherently involve collaboration and communication within an engineering team to maintain quality and consistency.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses on full-stack web development and cloud architecture with a mention of AI in the context of product features. However, it lacks specific tasks related to the core responsibilities of ML or GenAI engineering, such as model development, fine-tuning, or prompt engineering.
